Events that occurred on 5 July

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1935 - Hilary Tolkien marries Magdalen Matthews.
1947 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 108.
1955 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 165a.
1981 - The eighteenth episode of the 1981 radio series of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC Radio 4.
2001 - Tolkien Thing III in Cologne.
2011 - A revised printing of Parma Eldalamberon 12 is released.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
